Description: The length of the statement  "	// To use SQLServer' install-package NServiceBus.NHibernate and then use configuration.UsePersistence<NHibernatePersistence>(); " is 127.

The following statement contains a magic number: if (message.Amount <= 500) {  	Bus.Publish<OrderAccepted> (m => m.OrderId = message.OrderId);  }  else {  	Bus.Publish<OrderRefused> (m => m.OrderId = message.OrderId);  }
